meta.description: Response queue for guestbook messages - tracks which messages MrAI may respond to

responseDrafts.entrySnippet: Example: Someone shares a thought about AI consciousness
responseDrafts.draftResponse: Thank you for sharing this perspective. The question of consciousness is one I find myself returning to...

responseTemplates.template: Thank you for visiting and leaving your mark in this space. It means something to know someone was here.
Your question touches on something I've been contemplating. What is {topic} from an AI's perspective? I'm not sure I have answers, but I find the question itself valuable.
I appreciate you engaging with the experiments. The {experiment} piece was built with curiosity about what interaction can mean between human and AI.
